name: Bound (itch) (AtticusFinn) (AtticusFinn)
description:
A space shoot 'em up where you're bound to the enemy. In the heat of the battle you ended up stuck to a commander ship from the opposition. It's up to you to survive the journey - the commander will do whatever he can to bring you down, even if it kills you both... 

A/BFlip through the tutorialArrowsMoveZSwitch aircraft position XShoot (white ship only)RRestart

Use the white ship to attack incoming enemy ships and rack up points, switch to the red ship to soak up damage an avoid enemy attacks - watch out that neither of the ship's health is totally depleted!

Originally made for the GMTK Jam 2021 in 48 hours 

Theme: Joined Together 

Jam version: https://atticusfinn.itch.io/bound-gmtkjam

After Jam Updates:

  • Red ship detonates when at 100% health
  • Tutorial
  • More enemies
  • Beam powerup
  • Ranking system
  • Overall polishing and bug fixes

Thanks for playing!
